concepts.title: Lights-out Automation
concepts.info: Car companies had the idea to beat their competitors by having robots and their assembly lines make their products without any human maintenance or supervision.

concepts.title: The Debate for Automation
concepts.info: People who argue for automation believe that robots and other self-servicing machines take all of the jobs that no one really wants to have and that by taking away those jobs it allows factory workers to pursue more rewarding jobs.

concepts.title: The Debate Aginst Automation
concepts.info: Those against automation say that it leads to loss of jobs. They also argue that keeping both humans and robots on a work force is dehumanizing to the workers.

concepts.title: What is Automation?
concepts.info: Automation according to the dictionary is 'the use of largely automatic equipment in a system of manufacturing or other production process'.

events.title: The Future of Automation
events.info: Automation is being used increasingly in multiple fields such as banking and aviation. The ultimate goal for manufacturing automation is lights out automation.

events.title: Automation's Affect of Sufferage
events.info: As machines played an even more increasing role in production, women began to advocate for better pay citing that if machines can do the work then they could too
